item.description:
Join the SSFMG for a walk along Wollaston Beach. Enjoy the crisp air as we walk and chat. You'll find that time goes by quickly. Since Wollaston is so well lit, we will not need to stop as it get dark. Plan on walking 1-1.5 hours depending on the group consenus. Hopefully the weather will work out and we'll have a great night!

If you have any questions about this event, please contact me. THANKS!

Wollaston Beach Walk
Thursday, October 22th at 6pm
Caddy Memorial Park
Quincy Shore Drive
Quincy, MA
(the park by the traffic light across the street from the beach)

Event Fees: Organizer Team and Annual Members - Free, Members and Guests - $2 per person (Cash Only. Please try to bring exact change. No large bills please.)

Organizer(s): Elaine (let me know if anyone wants to co-organize)

Min/Max: At least 3 Yes RSVPs by 4pm on Wednesday, October 21th.

Attendance is unlimited.

Guests: Welcome!

RSVP Deadline: Please finalize your RSVP by 4pm on Tuesday, October 21th.

Inclement Weather:
We will walk if it is overcast or there is a slight drizzle. Check back here on Thursday for an update if the weather is questionable. All Yes RSVPs will be emailed by 4pm if the event is canceled due to the weather.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Directions to Caddy Memorial Park @ Wollaston Beach:

Wollaston Beach can be accessed from many points.

The best way to get to our meeting place is to get off 93N at Exit 8 (Furnace Brook Parkway), exit ramp rotary following small green sign for Furnace Brook Parkway, and follow Furnace Brook Parkway for 2.9 miles.

Furnace Brook Parkway ends at Wollaston Beach, and you take a left onto Quincy Shore Drive.

After only 0.2 (two-tenths) miles, our meeting place comes up on the left.

The parking lot for Caddy Park has a small footbridge and a flag poll that are visible from the main road. Look for the organizers there.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the parking lot by the flag pole.

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Walk at Wollaston Beach
